message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know you'll find extremely valuable.  I'm confident it will be worth at least $1,200,000 to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.  This is a significant discount from its true value and a chance for you to acquire something truly exceptional.  Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss the details further.
